title: State of Decay: Year-One
notes: Same buggy game, but good performance at mid-settings with no v-sync. Can only run @ 1600x900 here, but in fullscreen with Xbox One controller support. Cannot run in Big Picture Mode--black screen, audio seizes.

title: State of Decay: Year-One
notes: Since latest driver and beta updates, game runs exactly as intended.

title: State of Decay: Year-One
notes: About 60% of native performance. Over 60fps at High 1080p. Gives error that your video card is unsupported but works anyways. Has a glitch that causes the courser to move diagonally slowly to the upper left while aiming with guns and while in the map.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 380 Series (TONGA, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Does work out of the box but the fps are a bit lower than on windows and sometimes the screen freezes for a moment.
title: State of Decay: YOSE
